page.title: 15RECREATION CHILDREN,ROMSLEY
page.content: In the village is a playing field,new adventure apparatus opened this June. A Scout Hut is on the site for Scouts, Cubs and Beaver Group(6-7yr.). Guides meet in the school and Brownies in the Church Hall.The Playgroup have use of one room in the school and a Toddlers Group meet in the Methodist Church. "I am Carrie-Ann Bagley.I belong to 2nd.Romsley Brownie Pack run by Brown Owl,Tawny Owl,Ollie & Barnie.We go on Saturdays 10-11 a.m.We play games and do badge work.My six is Gnomes.There are six of us.Before we go home we do Brownie Bells,a song and a prayer." "I am Helen Westwood.I like Romsley as my grandad and granny live next door. It is nice as I have lots of friends to play with after school.I like to go to Brownies and Sunday School and lots of nice walks in the countryside.I do not like the snow deep on the hills."
